metadata.title: Ordonnance et instruction pastorale de Monseigneur l'archevesque de Paris portant condamnation du livre intitulé, Exposition de la foy touchant la grace & la prédestination :

metadata.call_number: Case Wing folio Z144 .A1 v. 2 no. 86
metadata.description: Dated 28 Aug. 1696 and signed at end: Louis Antoine, archevêque de Paris
The condemned book is by Martin de Barcos
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination. Title page and cover are combined. Text extends off of the edge of the page.
